item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 10:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Show HN: MynaUI Icons – 1180 Beautifully Crafted Open Source Icons (52 points | 15 comments)
2. Busy Status Bar (1112 points | 360 comments)
3. Cheating alleged after men's world conker champion found with steel chestnut (237 points | 305 comments)
4. Making FreeDOS Smaller [video] (30 points | 7 comments)
5. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (366 points | 120 comments)
6. Commonly used arm positions can overestimate blood pressure readings: study (244 points | 170 comments)
7. A History of Microwave Ovens (31 points | 6 comments)
8. How to fork (60 points | 12 comments)
9. Gosub – An open-source browser engine (274 points | 132 comments)
10. A Brief History of Defragging (12 points | discuss)
11. Drawing Graphics on Apple Vision with the Metal Rendering API (14 points | 4 comments)
12. Local TypeScript Super SDK to Call 200 LLMs (53 points | 18 comments)
13. Splitting engineering teams into defense and offense (103 points | 70 comments)
14. The three-page paper that shook philosophy: Gettiers in software engineering (191 points | 116 comments)
15. Show HN: X11 tool to share a screen area in any video meeting (271 points | 126 comments)
16. Play 3.0 mini – A lightweight, reliable, cost-efficient Multilingual TTS model (190 points | 60 comments)
17. Extracting financial disclosure and police reports with OpenAI Structured Output (187 points | 47 comments)
18. The web I want vs. the one we have (77 points | 75 comments)

20. The Physics of Magic Windows (2021) (115 points | 7 comments)
21. Remains of an ancient Greek structure found in Croatia (91 points | 27 comments)
22. Linear Variable Differential Transformer (LVDT) Basics (56 points | 15 comments)
23. PayloadCMS: Open-Source, Fullstack Next.js Framework (154 points | 47 comments)
24. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (183 points | 43 comments)
25. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (492 points | 358 comments)
26. Can a biologist fix a radio? What I learned while studying apoptosis (2002) [pdf] (53 points | 14 comments)
27. Zamba2-7B (240 points | 51 comments)
28. Routine dental X-rays are not backed by evidence (175 points | 156 comments)
29. Creating a tiny tensor library in C (6 points | discuss)
30. Automating the most annoying aspects of blogging (35 points | 18 comments)
